message.body: (1/2) This is like the end of the world. I cant watch the news but im lostening to the police radio. How is this violent rioting proving that we need to have a
(2/2) more peaceful police force?
How many small businesses are being destroyed tonight? Yikes. Fires, heavy gun fire, officers not responding, this radio is insane
People are mad. That's what happens if you are repeatedly looked over.
Scary
Yeah.
Sorry if I woke you. Didnt realize its 12
No I've been watching the news too for awhile
Talking to my neighbors earlier.
Wish I could watch the news. .. you should hear the police radios. It's non stop. Neighbors shooting each other. Drive by s with rifles
Download the app police radio 5-0. Its 1.99 but wow
50-75 people burning down a bbq place. All armed
You can hear the panic in their voices.
I'm watching a couple live streams.
Someones at a bus stop shooting at random cars
I just hope this is taken seriously. Peoples outrage is just gonna make racists more racist.
And that makes my heart hurt
Some will use as an excuse to be crazy... I just heard toys r us being looted. Some are going to try to loot as much as possible to have a good Christmas
"Cops are busy so im going to get a couple play stations"
Haha as you were saying that hunter just came in the bedroom with his shotgun (there's protesting downtown)
"Retreat from toys r us, its not safe... over 100 cars loading up"
Jesus
Seriously download this app. The media is so different than the hard facts of actual police calls
Take ALL the playstations
I want a giant studfed Olaf
Stuffed
I'm not gonna fear monger tonight. I was talking for awhile with Zaire and his mom and grand mom and the anger is palpable about a lot of bigger issues than this indictment.
Zaire's dad was wrongfully shot.
Yes, it definitely hits a lot of people on a personal level
Yeah. It does. Think that's good though. I'd rather have people feel strongly than nothing at all.
Either way.
Feel strongly yes. But to retailiate with random violence???
I know, youre mad. But you cant randomly shoot people walking down the street!!
I agree!!
You cant storm into someones home and rob them
It happens every single day in black neighborhoods. Not at this level. But every day
And something is wrong with that.
It's a poverty issue
Something is definitely wrong w random violence
I agree.
Youre right. People are stressed, scared, addicted, hopeless...
Yes.
How many people are going to die tonight?
We fear terrorism from other countries but tonight we are our own terrorists
(1/2) In my quiet lottle town of Front Royal, tonighy has actually made me contemplate that maybe I need a gun for self defense in the house. Im case something
(2/2) were to ever happen. That scares me. I dont want a gun in here :(
You feel threatened?
I do want to take a self defense class
No. But listening to this makes it a reality
I'm gonna shut off for awhile! See you at thanksgiving. I'm dreading it :/
Love you.
Love you too. Night.
